entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Bas-Caraquet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bas-Caraquet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:19 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bas Caraquet 12:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Temperature: -2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.6°C
Wind: WNW 23 km/h gust 45 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 15 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
